trends: There have been no other sightings in Carthage
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsafter hearing linda m howe on coast to coast i went outside in my backyard with binoculars. i looked up and saw a very bright glittering orb and then looked at it with binoculars. it transformed into a moving cord swirling and whirling rapidly in different directions, flashing brilliant light as it moved. after awhile, it stopped moving and transformed back into the sphere and under it you can see a rectangular form with spots of light on it. by naked eye, this looks like a vertical tail below the orb. i have watched these orbs since 6\27 every clear night i can. they are all over the sky in all directions. they cloak major stars and planets and appear in their sky positions. examples are jupiter, mars, betelgeuse, rigel, syrius, middle star in orion belt. the orbs react to my putting attention on them (esp. gratitude\love) by beginning to stir and move. i can see their movement with the naked eye and it appears sometimes to move 1-2 inches back and forth which must be a vast distance in space. they are the size of a star so they are quite a distance away. a cloudy night will hide them so they are higher than the earth's cloud cover. they seem to all be in 3 colors: white, orange or multi rainbow colors. mars & betelgeuse are orange, rigel is white and syrius is rainbow colored. their light is brighter than the stars and it often flashes, so it catches the eye. i speculate that the rectangular shape below them might be a type of ship. they all have that configuration. i live in a small town (6,500) south of i20 near the louisiana border. barksdale afb is approximately 75-100 miles east of here. i have some digital photos of the orbs and even some videos. they are not expert quality as my digital camera has only a 30x zoom and the photos do not capture the beautiful bright light of the orbs. i don't know what type of video camera would be able to photograph them adequately. i speculate that the forms they take could be hyperspace language (jim sparks & stewart swerdlow websites). i wish i could videotape the movements in order to break it down into frames and study them to see what the sequence of shapes might mean to someone who reads hyperspace. once i was attempting to photograph them and for some reason, the orb did not want me to do so. my battery would go as soon as i tried to take the first photo. i went through several batteries and it continued to blow them so i stopped trying. other times, the orb seemed to accept my photographing it and would move and swirl rapidly while i was taping it. i definitely feel there is a connection when i put my attention on them. i am very sensitive to energies and i only feel positive energy from them.
Summary: Bright flashing light with tail by naked eye changed to swirling cord moving in myriad forms
